Parameters: Set: a list of locales to present in a UI list. The casing uses the settings in the LocaleDisplayNames instance.

boolean: if true, compares the nameInSelf, otherwise the nameInDisplayLocale. Set depending on which field (displayLocale vs self) is to show up in the UI. If both are to show up in the UI, then it should be the one used for the primary sort order.
Comparator: how to collate—should normally be Collator.getInstance(getDisplayLocale())
Throws: if any of the locales in localeSet are malformed.

ClassDesc: Returns display names of ULocales and components of ULocales. For more information on language, script, region, variant, key, and values, see @B_android#icu#util#ULocale_E@.
